content: --ग्रीव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having a beautiful neck. (--वः {1} a hero. {2} a swan. {3} a kind of weapon. {4} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the four horses of Kṛṣṇa. {5} of Śiva. {6} of Indra. {7} <ab>N.</ab> of a monkeychief and brother of Vāli. [By the advice of Kabandha Rāma went to Sugrīva who told him how his brother had treated him and besought his assistance in recovering his wife, promising at the same time that he would assist Rāma in recovering his wife Sītā. Rāma, therefore, killed Vāli, and installed Sugrīva on the throne. He then assisted Rāma with his hosts of monkeys in conquering Rāvaṇa, and recovering Sītā.].
